mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id,owner_user_name,owner_real_name,owner_mobile,order_amount,post_address,status,create_user_name,create_time,modify_time,remark,express_fee,user_type) values(#{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ownerUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ownerRealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ownerMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderAmount, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{postAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{modifyTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{expressFee, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{userType, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set order_id=#{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},owner_user_name=#{ownerUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},owner_real_name=#{ownerRealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},owner_mobile=#{ownerMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},order_amount=#{orderAmount, jdbcType=BIGINT},post_address=#{postAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},status=#{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},create_user_name=#{createUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},create_time=#{createTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},modify_time=#{modifyTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},remark=#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},express_fee=#{expressFee, jdbcType=BIGINT},user_type=#{userType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id=#{orderId}

update orders set
owner_user_name=#{ownerUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_real_name=#{ownerRealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_mobile=#{ownerMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_amount=#{orderAmount, jdbcType=BIGINT},
post_address=#{postAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status=#{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_name=#{createUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time=#{createTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time=#{modifyTime, jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark=#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
express_fee=#{expressFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
user_type=#{userType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where order_id=#{orderId}
